content:
NYE MUST KNOW

We are delighted to have you as our Resident and wish you a pleasant holiday season.

In preparation for your New Year’s Eve 2019 stay, please review the following information regarding important arrival and security procedures.

HOTEL ARRIVAL:

For safety and security purposes, it is imperative that you bring your hotel confirmation and the letter provided by the hotel via email along with a photo ID to gain access to the hotel cross street and the hotel entrance.

DRIVING:

Beginning at 4AM on New Year’s Eve, certain cross streets will be closed to vehicular traffic from 38th Street to 59th Street between 6th Avenue and 8th Avenue.

WestHouse advises all arriving guest to anticipate heavy traffic volume in the city. Additionally, parking garages in this vicinity will be closed at 11AM on New Year’s Eve.

WHERE TO EAT:

DINNER: Our recommendations:

PARK LOUNGE NYE DINNER

First seating 5PM | Second Seating 9PM
Tickets: $125
Park Lounge, located around the corner, in our sister hotel, welcomes you for a festive dinner to celebrate 2020!
https://www.parkcentralny.com/park-lounge

TIMES SQUARE FAMILY PASS

7PM at Times Square
Tickets: $99 - $229
Get exclusive access to a multiple New Year’s Eve parties in and around Times Square. Whether, you choose to party hop all night or to stay put at one of these great events, you can be sure that the Times Square Family Pass will make for to an unforgettable New Year’s Eve in NYC.
https://www.balldrop.com/times-square-family-pass

VALERIE’S ROARING TWENTIES NEW YEAR’S EVE

9:30PM at Valerie
Tickets: $200 - $1300
Manhattan’s most glamorous pleasure-seekers are invited for an unforgettable night of Glitz and Glam! Featuring a 6 piece jazz band and magician + illusionist Devonte Rosero. The evening is sure to be a celebration of all the senses with a 3 hours of free-flowing lawless liquor. Ford’s Gin + Tonics and an extensive selection of passed hors d’oeuvres. So, shimmy-on down for an unforgettable evening as we loosen our inhibitions and party like Gatsby would - all night long.
https://www.valerienewyorkcity.com/store/event/valeries-roaring-20s-new-years-eve/

TAO NYE 2020

9PM at TAO Downtown
Tickets: $125 - $5,000
General Admission includes 4 Hour Open Bar 9PM-1AM, passed hors d’oeuvres, and champagne toast at midnight
https://taodowntownny.electrostub.com/event.cfm?cart&id=215805 

GOTHAM HALL NEW YEAR’S EVE 2019

9PM at Gotham Hall
Tickets: $99 +
New York City’s Gotham Hall, a historical and epic ballroom, is one of the city’s most treasured event spaces. And this New Year’s Eve, the fabulous Gotham Hall is opening its gorgeous doors for a what’s-sure-to-be amazing NYE extravaganza! This is the absolute perfect spot for you to dance the night away… and you can do just that! A live DJ will perform and spin dance, hip hop, 80’s, rock and top 40 hits all night long while you get your groove on! Festive NYE party favors will be passed to get you even more in the spirit. And as the night gets later, a live countdown to 2020 will take place. 
https://www.balldrop.com/new-years-eve-gotham-hall-nyc

NEW YEARS EVE AT CIPRIANI

9PM at Cipriani 42nd Street
Tickets: $145 - $235
Welcome 2020 with a romantic European flair in the heart of Times Square at Cipriani. You can party all night long in the gigantic dance floor assembled in the Grand Ballroom. Be sure to look your best as this room and the rest of the venue were created to serve royals. https://nycnewyears.com/new-years-eve-at-cipriani-42nd-street/
â€¨Email our concierge to make reservations: concierge@westhousehotelnewyork.com

BREAKFAST:

Join us at The Terrace from 6:30-10:30AM to kick-off the New Year with a healthy breakfast.

FITNESS CENTER:

On New Year’s Eve, the Fitness Center will close at 6PM and reopen on New Year’s Day at 5AM. If you want to get a head start on 2020 fitness resolutions, we recommend signing-up to the Central Park Midnight Run.

PARTY POLICY:

Party like it’s 2020 in Park Lounge or out and about in Times Square. The hotel otherwise has a strict No Party Policy on guest room floors. Also, guest room windows must remain closed at all times.

MORE INFORMATION:

For any further questions please contact us at: welcome@westhousehotelnewyork.com

HAPPY NEW YEAR!!
The WestHouse Team
